command.script: #!/bin/bash maxexecutionCount=$(curl -s -X POST -H "Accept: application/json" -H "Content-Type:application/json" --header "X-Rundeck-Auth-Token:$RD_OPTION_TOKEN" $RD_OPTION_URL/system/info | $RD_OPTION_JQ_PATH .[].stats.scheduler.threadPoolSize) freeMemory=$(curl -s -X POST -H "Accept: application/json" -H "Content-Type:application/json" --header "X-Rundeck-Auth-Token:$RD_OPTION_TOKEN" $RD_OPTION_URL/system/info | $RD_OPTION_JQ_PATH .[].stats.memory.free) freeMemory_GB=$(awk -v var1=$freeMemory -v var2=1024 -v var3=1024 -v var4=1024 'BEGIN { print ( var1 / var2 / var3 / var4 ) }') active_Threads=$(curl -s -X POST -H "Accept: application/json" -H "Content-Type:application/json" --header "X-Rundeck-Auth-Token:$RD_OPTION_TOKEN" $RD_OPTION_URL/system/info | $RD_OPTION_JQ_PATH .[].stats.threads.active) allocatedMemory=$(curl -s -X POST -H "Accept: application/json" -H "Content-Type:application/json" -H "X-Rundeck-Auth-Token: $RD_OPTION_TOKEN" $RD_OPTION_URL/system/info | $RD_OPTION_JQ_PATH .[].stats.memory.max ) allocatedMemory_GB=$(awk -v var1=$allocatedMemory -v var2=1024 -v var3=1024 -v var4=1024 'BEGIN { print ( var1 / var2 / var3 / var4 ) }') active_Threads_percent=$(bc <<<"scale=2; ($active_Threads / 700) * 100") active_Threads_percent=${active_Threads_percent%.*} tStamp=$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S') echo "$tStamp : Heap Memory(Free: $freeMemory_GB GB, Allocated: $allocatedMemory_GB GB)" echo "$tStamp : Active Threads Percent: $active_Threads_percent"
